website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel DS Trainer 23 received mostly positive reviews from consumers. They welcomed the snug and locked upper of this stability running shoe, emphasizing its capacity to accommodate lateral foot-movements. People also lauded its versatile design, functionality, and durability. There were a few complaints about the lack of additional colorways, but that didn’t deviate the shoe’s status as a worthy update to the long-running DS Trainer series of road running shoes.
pros: The upper unit of the Asics Gel DS Trainer 23 wrapped around the foot surely and securely, stated several consumers
Some runners noted that wearing this shoe for various running sessions and gym training felt agreeable
Most testers revealed that the in-shoe experience was instantly comfortable, that it didn’t need a break-in period
The lightweight nature of this product gained some fans who desired functionality and style in an insubstantial package
According to several users, it worked admirably as both a trainer and as a racer
The durability was lauded as it resisted wear and tear satisfactorily
A purchaser reported that the upper’s secure yet uncomplicated fit permitted lateral movements
cons: Some people lamented the drought of colorways
they would’ve preferred more options when it came to the visuals of this shoe

customer_reviews.title: Small fitting! Very small!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I hope they’re supportive enough as I over pronate and these were recommended. However I’ve had to go up a full size in comparison my Saucony Omni 16 (which were true to size). Had tried a half size initially as ASICS are notoriously small, but that was definitely not enough! Nice design though. Fingers crossed they perform well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Collins

customer_reviews.title: No support if you are flat footed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheaper alternative to my usual Brooks Adrenaline GTS trainers, and these were on offer at 50% of their pre-sale price. My heart sank as soon as I took the trainers out of the packaging and put them on. I am a very flat footed runner and these trainers offer absolutely NO arch support. The manufacturer has emphasised lightness at the expense of build strength. I will go back to Brooks, or New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: P.I

customer_reviews.title: Great Asics!
customer_reviews.text: Great race day shoes - light with a good amount of spring and support. I only train 3 - 4 days a week so I actually use them as daily trainers as well - road and treadmill. Love the bright yellow colour - it really pops!
customer_reviews.author: Fanie

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of reviews I had read online, and they haven't disappointed. I did buy half a size bigger (as this seemed to be a comment mentioned elsewhere) and that meant that they were spot on. Already been out for a few runs and they are very comfortable. For the price I m very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: philmills

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than other ASICS
customer_reviews.text: First time I've tried this trainer/running shoe, I usually go for GT 1000. I'm a shoe size 8, 8.5 in most trainers. These come up quite narrow, compared with the 1000, but as I have narrow feet , this suites me fine, better in fact
customer_reviews.author: P-38

customer_reviews.title: Great light shoe be careful on the fit
customer_reviews.text: Great light shoe be careful on the fit, I was warned and went up half a size and it is only just enough. Brighter than they look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a runner has been using these trainers for a long time never has a problem with them won’t use any other brand
customer_reviews.author: J M.

customer_reviews.title: AsIcs .. safe choice
customer_reviews.text: Asics and me get on .. usually go for the GT1000 range but gave tgese a whirl .. They feel lighter.snugger fit. Time will tell after a few miles so a little early to make any positive / negative comments .
customer_reviews.author: Steve Beale

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers but too narrow, even went a whole size up as friends have said these can come up small.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: So hole these are the correct length they are very narrow, especially for me with broad feet. However they are great shoes and have put a lot of miles into them. Great running shoes
customer_reviews.author: m2x

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought ASICS on a recommendation. The price of these was good, very quick delivery and perfect fit. Very comfortable when walking, especially after the Christmas dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Mr F

customer_reviews.title: Classic Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Asics DS trainers have been my go to running shoe for over a decade now. Comfortable fit with just enough cushioning for me. Just wish they were cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I upsized by one size and they fit the person I bought them for perfectly. He said they are the most comfortable shoes he’s ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ackermann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Asics Gel-DS Trainers in the past and these do not disappoint. They are light, fast and look great (the picture does not do them justice to how bright they are).Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kilner

customer_reviews.title: Sad bad ASICS shoe
customer_reviews.text: Only ASICS runners ever to hugely disappoint. The fit is more like a ladies size 7
customer_reviews.author: Breda Flynn murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes, ordered half-size larger than usual and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight distance running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable out of the box; good fit; I like the hi vis look; good up to half marathon on roads or light trails (in good weather). Would recommend and expect to buy again when I’ve worn these out.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-ds Trainer 23 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Asics Gel-DS Trainer 23 {Safety Yellow Mid Grey White] upper textile, synthetic lining textile sole synthetic ComforDry Sockliner Guidance System to support your running style gel-cushioning system provides for a reduction in impact Dynamic DuoMax Support System Clutch Counter Propulsion Trusstic System for powerful footprint AHAR+ outsole Flyte foam midsole cushioning: 10 mm Weight Single Shoe 232g based on a size 9
feature_bullets: ComforDry sockliner - removable insole with extra cushioning and moisture absorption for optimum comfort.
